extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to auto-apply configuration values to annotated types.

      • readConfigAnnotations

        public static <T> T readConfigAnnotations(java.lang.Class<? extends T> type,
                                          Configuration config,
                                          T target)
                                   throws ConfigurationException
        Reader and apply the values from the passed configuration based on the type annotations.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - Annotated object type.
        Parameters:
        type - - Type of the target object.
        config - - Configuration source.
        target - - Target to apply the values to.
        Returns:
        - Updated target instance.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
